Description.Title: SnowDry
Description.ExtendedDescription: Daily snowpack solid water calculation. Updates Sdry (mm water equivalent) from the previous day's solid stock (Sdry_t1) by adding snowfall accumulation (Snowaccu) and refreezing of liquid water (Mrf) and subtracting melt (M). If melt does not exceed the previous solid stock (M ≤ Sdry_t1), then Sdry = max(0.001, Sdry_t1 + Snowaccu + Mrf − M); otherwise Sdry remains at 0. Time step: 1 day.
Description.ShortDescription: Computes daily solid water in snowpack: Sdry = max(0.001, Sdry_t1 + Snowaccu + Mrf − M) when M ≤ Sdry_t1.

Input.name: Sdry_t1
Input.description: water in solid state in the snow cover in previous day

Input.name: Mrf
Input.description: liquid water in the snow cover in the process of refreezing

Input.name: M
Input.description: snow in the process of melting

Output.name: Sdry
Output.description: water in solid state in the snow cover
